str2: Early in the morning, at dawn. Adverb from pro; at dawn; by implication, the day-break watch.
Very; very much, exceedingly, greatly. Of uncertain affinity; much.
In the night. Neuter of a compound of en and nux; by night.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
